title: Healthcare Analytics Challenges: A Three-Pillar Framework Connecting Analytics Maturity, Workforce Dynamics, and Technical Barriers
description: Research repository containing the narrative review 'Healthcare Analytics Challenges' and a Python-based systematic literature review tool. The paper synthesizes evidence on analytics maturity, workforce turnover, and NL2SQL technologies. The included tool implements Clean Architecture for rigorous academic claim verification.
notes: Version 1.28.0 includes the full Paper 1 manuscript submitted to JMIR Medical Informatics and the accompanying literature review toolset.
